title: Cliff hanging moments from the serials
brief_description: A selection of three trailers from the 1920s motion picture serials and feature films: 1. The 15 chapter serial “The Steel Trail” (1923), starring William Duncan and Edith Johnson. 2. The 15 chapter serial “Captain Kidd” (1922) starring Eddie Polo. 3. “A Woman in grey” (1920) starring Arline Pretty and Henry G. Sell
